Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mentuanya, Rusman, menembaknya untuk mengelakkan lebih ramai mangsa. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: Tmo Milik Siapa Syurga Itu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Milik Siapa Syurga Itu

programme.title: Hello Itu Bff I
programme.desc: Selepas menamatkan pelajaran di luar negara, seorang wanita muda pulang ke tanah air dengan perasaan tidak sabar ingin bertemu bff tersayangnya. Namun kehadiran BFF baharu dalam kehidupan kawannya telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu dan bengang dalam dirinya. dia mencuba pelbagai helah untuk memisahkan mereka dan akibatnya berlaku pergaduhan antara dia dan sahabat baru kawannya

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Milea bertemu dengan Dilan di sebuah sekolah menengah di Bandung pada tahun 1990. Perkenalan yang luar biasa membuatkan Milea mengenali keunikan Dilan yang bijak, baik dan romantik di matanya.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie Iii
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Gentleman T
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah empat beradik "T", Tu, Ta, Tom dan Tam. Tahun persekolahan baru baru sahaja bermula dan keempat-empatnya mempunyai kelas baharu. Masing-masing mahukan sepasang kasut tenis baru yang mahal, tetapi mereka tidak mahu menyusahkan ibu bapa mereka. Mereka memutuskan untuk menghasilkan t-shirt untuk dijual kepada rakan mereka di sekolah.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: 2 orang pemuda yang mempunyai wajah yang serupa walaupun tidak mempunyai apa-apa perhubungan. Seorang ialah anak kampung yang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal tetapi gagal kerana tidak berkelulusan tinggi, dan seorang lagi ialah pelakon filem terkenal yang sudah bosan dengan dunianya & inginkan kebebasan.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep12
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Maama Machan
programme.desc: ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Kisah dua orang sahabat yang menyara hidup dengan mencuri motosikal secara kecil-kecilan untuk satu sindiket.

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Milea bertemu dengan Dilan di sebuah sekolah menengah di Bandung pada tahun 1990. Perkenalan yang luar biasa membuatkan Milea mengenali keunikan Dilan yang bijak, baik dan romantik di matanya.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Epok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Epok yang cuba membaiki hubungan tegang antara dia dan bapanya, Pak Din, melalui sukan badminton

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: 2022 Tsunami
programme.desc: Pada tahun 2022, Perdana Menteri Tribhop dan Dr. Siam menubuhkan pusat amaran bencana negara untuk mengelakkan bencana tsunami yang lain. Tetapi usaha mereka terbukti sia-sia apabila tragedi melanda lagi.

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Bisu
programme.desc: Nazim menyesal tak sempat berjasa dan menunaikan umrah untuk ibunya. Dia mencari calon ibu yang sesuai untuk disedekahkan pakej umrah. Doanya dimakbul bila terjumpa dengan Mak Nong, peminta sedekah yang bisu.

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mentuanya, Rusman, menembaknya untuk mengelakkan lebih ramai mangsa. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep13
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.

programme.title: 2022 Tsunami
programme.desc: Pada tahun 2022, Perdana Menteri Tribhop dan Dr. Siam menubuhkan pusat amaran bencana negara untuk mengelakkan bencana tsunami yang lain. Tetapi usaha mereka terbukti sia-sia apabila tragedi melanda lagi.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kisah percintaan di timur tengah antara Norlela, dan Putera Amran. Norlela bekerja sebagai penghibur di istana. Raja, telah menitahkan agar Amran dikahwinkan dengan Puteri Faridah, dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Amran tidak bersetuju dan Raja telah murka dengan keputusan Amran.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Woman Soto Didadaku Woman Soto Kebanggaanku
programme.desc: Naya, seorang pembuat sup, ditawarkan untuk menjadi hos bersama acara dan imbuhannya ialah menonton bola sepak Pasukan Kebangsaan dalam kelas VIP. Itu sudah menjadi impian Naya. Namun, harapannya gagal.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep111
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep4
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep6
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep35
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep85
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Ujian Ramadhan Gadis Penjual Dodol Yang Gemar Bershalawat
programme.desc: Nafisah, seorang gadis cantik, menjual dodol untuk menyara dirinya dan ibunya. Nafisah tidak pernah putus berdoa. Bagaimanapun, hidupnya semakin mencabar kerana ibunya disahkan menghidap kegagalan buah pinggang.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep28
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga

programme.title: Nenek Penjual Bakiak Yang Mendapat Berkah Setelah Menolong Bocah Hilang Ingatan
programme.desc: Walaupun sudah tua, Nenek Anna sentiasa bersemangat menjual terompah buatan Atuk Harun untuk menampung kehidupan. Sejak kecil, Ella tidak pernah mengambil berat tentang ibu bapanya walaupun mereka sudah tua. Dalam satu kejadian, Nenek Anna dan Atuk Harun menjaga Kasih yang hilang ingatan.

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep11
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep30
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep7
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gangster 3
programme.desc: The daughter of a Hong Kong triad boss is accused of killing the leader of their rivals. She goes into hiding in Korea and meets Ki-chul and his crew, who are assigned to protect her.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Tazza: The Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Josée to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the case, only to uncover a government conspiracy that is bigger than they could have ever imagined.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45834584

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10131014
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1799
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45834584
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1799
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3578
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45844585

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10151016
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2017
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Jiang Play(M) Ep7
programme.desc: We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy about a murdered cop returning from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie (Chow) into avenging his death.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamu’s wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. “Paws-Men” tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Peng fought against many swordsmen and won, so he could not accept his first defeat and wanted to commit suicide. It is at this time that Peng meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader. They fall in love and want to get married. The Sect leader gives Peng the “Full Moon Scimitar” on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fung’s life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan’s first major movies) for an evocative and terrific “Martial arts world” adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao’s home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife’s faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate’s daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman & coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named “The Fastest Sword” but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong’s hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Mugan is a science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Anand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.title: Heroes

programme.title: The Rising Tide
programme.desc: When her father fails to return home, the sound of his boat’s engine is the only thing a daughter has to remember of him. Learning from an elderly mechanic, she wishes to repair her father’s boat in hope of his return.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Nightfall In India
programme.desc: In the 60s, Ricardo would facilitate overland travel from Europe to India for hippies. Now, he’s in the last stages of a degenerative disease. For his epic final journey, he sets off on the same route with his housekeeper and a hopeful spirit.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Wayfarer
programme.desc: Thomas Bareski is a wandering, nature-loving ex-cop who lives out of his van and his life’s mission is to help solve some of France’s 310 unsolved murders. He arrives in Montallier to investigate his first case – the disappearance of a young girl.

programme.title: This Teacher
programme.desc: When a reunion with her childhood friend proves disastrous, a French Muslim woman escapes to a remote cabin in upstate New York. However, her paranoia and the presence of an Islamophobic American couple disrupt her self-reflective retreat.

programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiancée, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep6

programme.desc: In this episode we see how an autistic comedian is helped to reveal to her mum what's really going on inside her head, and gives a non-speaking autistic man the chance to take his message to the world.

programme.desc: Frozen Peaks - Found on every continent, mountains create unique frozen worlds, home to extraordinary animals that must overcome the crushing conditions of the cold.

programme.desc: Buses - The red double-decker bus is a global icon. Now, Gregg Wallace has special access to a factory in Scarborough, Yorkshire, where they build this famous people mover.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep3

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: A look at how grinders in Tim Hortons' mammoth roasting facility tackle thousands of pounds of coffee beans every hour. Also, we look out how empanadas are made on an epic scale, and the history of cocktail sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: This episode looks at factories producing jelly buttons, baby puree, feta cheese and baklava.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Commuters - This episode explores whether the secret to an animal's success in is to keep one foot in the wild and one in the city, becoming a wild commuter. They must overcome the unique challenges the urban world throws at them to benefit from the opportunities on offer.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: This Hallowe'en special looks at factories producing bubble gum eyeballs, monster-themed chocolate bars, toffee apples and molasses sweets.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: A look at how some Halloween treats are made, including spooky marshmallow lollipops, milk chocolate witch bars and bat cookies.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Hardest Challenge - This series looks at the relationship between predators and their prey, including how leopards use stealth, wild dogs use stamina and killer whales use teamwork and intelligence.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Britain (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: This episode takes Joanna from North Wales to St Michael's Mount and the West Country, ending in her home town of London.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Expedition Unseen - Steve takes on four entirely new adventures to remote parts of the planet - including Saudi Arabia, Gabon and Mexico - in search of precious natural wonders.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Seward - Robson travels to Seward, Alaska, where he must catch three species of fish from a set list in a single day, but first he trains in Homer where the halibut are enormous!

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Domino Effect - Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Baby Animals - Prequel 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Raising Babies - Follow the staff at Parc Omega in Quebec, Canada, during the busy spring when moose, boars, raccoons, and visiting Canada geese have their babies.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Leaving Home - An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Great Addo Elephant - The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the “big seven”: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Trouble in Paradise - Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain - Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dilla’s Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Warriors of the Llanos - The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Trouble in Paradise - Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: iSimangoliso - In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kesi Turns a Corner - Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3

programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Bromley reuniting a family with their kitchen. Bored of Dad James' cooking, the Winbournes often eat out but they all need to play their part, cooking from scratch and saving cash for the future.

programme.desc: Ship's captain Dorran promised his family he'd build a super-modern underground lair on a hill outside Canterbury. But as the epic build hits choppy waters, Dorran feels forced to take control of the build himself.

programme.desc: It's fast food week, and, with a place in the semi-final at stake, the final five cooks level up instant noodles and attempt to bash out Mexican fast food in just 90 seconds.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep27
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each other’s (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep1
programme.desc: War and Trees / Trade Wreck - Audrey defends Tiny when the Bloogey Boys exclude him from the treehouse. The trading tree turns into havoc after the Harvey Girls try to get around the rules.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep27
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each other’s (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep11
programme.desc: Two Twigs/Fresh Coat of Pain - The Mighty Ones can't tell the difference between Twig and a random stick bug. / Rocksy sees fresh coat of paint spilled all over and becomes obsessed with trying to freshen up the yard.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat’s in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep11
programme.desc: Two Twigs/Fresh Coat of Pain - The Mighty Ones can't tell the difference between Twig and a random stick bug. / Rocksy sees fresh coat of paint spilled all over and becomes obsessed with trying to freshen up the yard.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Pockets - Pat-Pat wants to play detective for the day with Noddy, but the only problem is that they don't have a case to solve... that is until the Pockets go missing. Where can they be? It's up to Noddy and Pat Pat to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Cabbage Monster - When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs Not Listening - Noddy's excitedly looking forward to his first ever go at driving Train. But then Revs starts playing up and won't listen when Noddy asks him to stop. Why is Revs not listening to him? A puzzled Noddy investigates to find out what's wrong with his friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time to Be Quiet, a Time to Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed… will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep3
programme.desc: Dodgems - Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep1
programme.desc: Fang Decay / Scare Day - Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep2
programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep28
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 2 - As Mort and Clover search for their leader, King Julien shows off his pirate booty moves and convinces the pirates he should be captain of the ship.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Olivia Ep3
programme.desc: Olivia Trains Her Cat - When Olivia's class holds a pet talent show, nobody can beat Francine's amazingly talented cat Gwendolyn. Olivia's lethargic cat Edwin, who barely moves, suddenly goes missing. Olivia then fancies herself a cat detective as shetracks down the missing cat.

programme.title: Olivia Ep4
programme.desc: Olivia's Lemonade Stand - Olivia's lemonade stand is losing customers to Francine's pink lemonade stand. Olivia does her one better by opening up her own full-scale backyard restaurant, imagining it's a fabulous supper club. But Olivia soon finds that her restaurant needs something she can only get from Francine – something pink!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep3
programme.desc: Dodgems - Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep2
programme.desc: While You Weren't Sleeping / The Secret Strife of Pets - Sick of nighttime cutting fun short, the kids pulls an all-nighter. A mystery critter shows up on Harvey Street and Dot wants it gone!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.
